mapper.update: update NOTICE set NOT_TITLE = #{NOT_TITLE}, NOT_CONTENT = #{NOT_CONTENT}, NOT_DATE = date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') where 1 = 1 and NOT_NO = #{NOT_NO} ;
mapper.select: select NOT_NO, NOT_TITLE, NOT_CONTENT, date_format(ifnull(NOT_REDATE, NOT_DATE), '%Y-%m-%d') as "DATE" from NOTICE where 1 = 1 and NOT_NO = #{NOT_NO};
select CUS_NO, CUS_ID, CUS_NICK, CUS_NAME, CUS_GENDER, CUS_BIRTH, CUS_TEL, CUS_EMAIL, date_format(ifnull(CUS_REDATE, CUS_DATE), '%Y-%m-%d') as "DATE" from CUSTOMER order by CUS_NO desc;
